title: Mr. Darcy Comes to Dinner
description: A modern day BWWM Pride and Prejudice Inspired Variation of the Classic Tale, just in time for the holidays!  Olivia is the second oldest of the Bennett sisters, and the brain trust behind their brilliant new design firm, Divine Designs. Spunky, confident and full of big ideas, she notices the tall, dark and handsome Mr. Darcy at a gala fund-raiser from across the ballroom. When he turns out to be a snob, she shrugs it off and goes on living her best life.  But Will Darcy regrets his sharp words. He finds himself in the strange position of defending his friend Martin Bingley from love with Janelle, the oldest Bennett sister, while falling head over heels himself. Charmed in spite of his hardened heart, will Darcy get his Christmas wish?  Light, steamy, quirky and sweet, this re-telling will make you smile. Enjoy a BWWM holiday special from Jorja Tabu!
author: Jorja Tabu
